netapp_volume_create_size_help: The volume size is between {{minSize}}GB and {{maxSize}}GB
netapp_volume_create_success: Your volume has been created. You can log in once the access control rules have been configured.
netapp_volume_create_error: An error has occurred creating the volume. {{message}}
netapp_volume_mount_path_already_used_er: The mount path is already in use on another volume. Please enter a new one.
